name: Down The Hole (CastimierDev)
description:
A NES game where you wind down a hole, you play as a balerina, i guess, and your only goal is to reach the end of the hole.

It is recommended to play with save states and a controller!

Who knows why you are here? When you are here? How you are here? And most important, what is at the end of the hole?

(This is just a proof of concept so there is only one level and when you reacht the end you just see a win screen)

Audio is from NESmaker/thenew8bitheroes
